room_title: Escape room "Mind Trap" by Escape Room Arlington in Arlington (VA)
review: So, so creepy! Not too many spoilers, but- hidden rooms. Brains. Darkness. Super fun, though! And terrifying!

room_title: Escape room "Mind Trap" by Escape Room Arlington in Arlington (VA)
review: Super put together! We've been to other escape rooms that weren't worth the review. We did Mind Trap.... turns out it's the only scary room they have and I. was. terrified. Definitely check them out!

room_title: Escape room "Mind Trap" by Escape Room Arlington in Arlington (VA)
review: Very fun!  Great night out - the Mind Trap room was awesome. Highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Mind Trap" by Escape Room Arlington in Arlington (VA)
review: This was the third time that my family and I have done an escape room together, and let's just say this escape room did not disappoint. We did the Mind Trap room, rates 6/10 difficulty, and we escaped with about 18 minutes left. There is a total of four rooms available to try, all ranging from different difficulties. As for the Mind Trap room itself, the decor was incredibly detailed, and the puzzles were challenging, but not impossible. When you successfully escape a room, you even get a free pin! Definitely will come back to try out the other rooms!
